about_the_game:
A set of imperial costumes with a focus on French exports, including:
A set of French imperial attire
Yu · Seven Feet
Imperial Crown
Imperial Records of the Grand Historian
A set of French imperial attire
Yu · Wuming Fan
Imperial Noble Bench
Yu · Han Shu
A set of bow style imperial attire
Yu Lingbao
Imperial Eagle Eyes
Yu Qianli Xue
A set of iron cavalry attire
Yu · Zhangbaping Barbarian Spear
Yu · You Long
Yu · Stepping on Snow without Trace
French stunt book:
The strategy of using divine calculation will definitely hit
Learn the special skill "Heart Repair" after using it to automatically increase mental power
After using actuarial skills, learn the special skill "Actuarial" and reduce the MP cost of spells by 50%
Consumables: Supreme Lion Awakening Pill * 10, Essence Cod Fish Pill * 10, Roasted Chicken Leg * 10, Goji Sauce * 10
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
Customer service QQ: 392788593 Email: 392788593@qq.com

Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan.
